mapper.select: SELECT mo.merchant_id as merchantId, mo.merchant_order_code as merchantOrderCode, cop.order_status_id as clientOrderStatus, cop.payment_method as paymentMethod, mo.grand_total as grandTotal, mi.apply_amount as applyAmount, mi.status as merchantInvoiceApplyStatus, mi.merchant_apply_code as merchantApplyCode, mi.invoice_type as invoiceType, cit.invoice_title as invoiceTitle, cit.tax_identification_number as taxIdentificationNumber, cit.bank as bank, cit.bank_account as bankAccount, cit.company_name as companyName, cit.create_time as createTime, cit.reg_address as regAddress, cit.reg_telephone as regTelephone, cosa.receiver_name as receiverName, cosa.receiver_phone_number as receiverPhoneNumber, cosa.province_name as provinceName, cosa.city_name as cityName, cosa.area_name as areaName, cosa.address_alias as addressAlias, cosa.detail_address as detailAddress, mu.merchant_user_name as deliveryCreator, mil.create_time as deliveryCreateTime, mil.delivery_type as deliveryType, mil.delivery_person as deliveryPerson, mil.delivery_phone as deliveryPhone, mil.number as number, ec.company_name as deliveryCompanyName FROM merchant_order mo LEFT JOIN merchant_invoice mi ON mi.merchant_order_id = mo.id LEFT JOIN client_order_personal cop ON cop.id = mo.client_order_id LEFT JOIN client_user cu ON cop.client_user_id = cu.id JOIN client_invoice_template cit ON cit.client_user_id = cu.id JOIN client_invoice ci ON ci.invoice_template_id = cit.id LEFT JOIN merchant_invoice_logistics mil ON mil.merchant_invoice_id = mi.id LEFT JOIN merchant_user mu ON mu.merchant_user_code = mil.creator LEFT JOIN express_company ec ON mil.express_company_id = ec.id LEFT JOIN client_order_shipping_address cosa ON ci.shipping_address_id = cosa.id WHERE mo.merchant_order_code = #{merchantOrderCode}
